title: Manage Animal Care and Use Protocol
description: A lab manager needs to submit an annual renewal for an active animal study protocol.

tasks.description: Identify the animal protocol that is due for renewal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct protocol in the system.

tasks.description: Update the protocol with the number of animals used in the past year and the number requested for the upcoming year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately updates the animal usage numbers.

tasks.description: Submit the renewal application to the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the renewal request.
